content: beginners take note of this great first garment that is sure to set you apart stitched in red heart super saver this easy pattern includes everything you need to guide you through the project learn chain double_crochet flat slip_stitch seaming and more with so many colors to choose from you can make one to match every outfit in your wardrobe measurements approximately approx 64 162 5 cm wide from cuff-to-cuff by 21 24 53 5 61 cm long before assembly materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m shocking pink 0718 small 2 balls 509/465 yds/m
